summary: AlignFunc positions quantum instructions according to a user‑provided callable that maps each instruction index to a fractional time within a total duration, arranging multi‑channel instructions into a coherent sequence.
business_intent: Enable users to define custom timing patterns for pulse sequences—such as dynamical decoupling (e.g., UDD)—by supplying a function that determines when each instruction should occur, facilitating flexible sequence construction at the cost of QPY incompatibility.
